commit.message:
re PR c++/51402 (ICE with invalid template parameter)

/cp
2012-01-20  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/51402

	tsubst for error_mark_node.

/testsuite
2012-01-20  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/51402
	* g++.dg/template/crash110.C: New.
